meanings.definition: The state or quality of being limitless.
meanings.sent1: The limitlessnesses of the ocean amazed the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The concept of limitlessnesses in space is mind-boggling.
meanings.sent3: The limitlessnesses of the buffet left everyone feeling stuffed!
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared into the limitlessnesses of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the vibrant limitlessnesses of nature.

meanings.definition: The property of having no limits or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The limitlessnesses of the desert seemed endless.
meanings.sent2: The company aimed for financial limitlessnesses in their growth.
meanings.sent3: The limitlessnesses of the internet can be overwhelming at times.
meanings.sent4: His dreams reached the limitlessnesses of the stars.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range displayed the majestic limitlessnesses of nature.
